law.full_text:
DELIVERY OF THE REPORT.
The reports of the Superintendent of Building and the City Engineer shall be delivered by the owner or his agent to the buyer or transferee of the subject residential property prior to entering into an agreement of sale or exchange of said property. Except that where in connection with said sale or exchange an escrow agreement has been executed, the seller or his agent may transmit said reports to the escrow agent with an instruction that said agent present these reports to the buyer or transferee prior to close of escrow, or may instruct the escrow agent to obtain said reports pursuant to the provisions of Section 96.303 and 96.305 of this Code and present them to the buyer or transferee prior to close of escrow. (Amended by Ord. No. 149,940, Eff. 8/19/77.)

unit.catch_line: Excavating, Depositing, Dumping – Earth, Sand, Gravel, Etc. – Where Prohibited.
Declaring Certain Area Subject To Inundation And Prohibiting Construction Of Certain Buildings Therein.

Information Furnished As Ground For Rescission.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
DELIVERY OF THE REPORT. (§ 96.307)
DELIVERY OF THE REPORT. The reports of the Superintendent of Building and the City Engineer shall be delivered by the owner or his agent to the buyer or transferee of the subject residential property prior to entering into an agreement of sale or exchange of said property. Except that where in connection with said sale or exchange an escrow agreement has been executed, the seller or his agent may transmit said reports to the escrow agent with an instruction that said agent present these reports to the buyer or transferee prior to close of escrow, or may instruct the escrow agent to obtain said reports pursuant to the provisions of Section 96.303 and 96.305 of this Code and present them to the buyer or transferee prior to close of escrow. (Amended by Ord. No. 149,940, Eff. 8/19/77.)
